headline.main: SOCIAL CLUE CITED IN HEART DISEASE; High Incidence in Industrial Nations Studied by Experts

byline.original: By ROBERT K. PLUMB Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: scientists at assn meeting rept on new data on causes of diseases
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Oct. 25 The scientific evidence comes pouring in from around the world. Physicians ponder each new piece and try to fit it into a jigsaw puzzle that will give an accurate picture of the causes of heart disease.
docs.snippet: LOS ANGELES, Oct. 25 The scientific evidence comes pouring in from around the world. Physicians ponder each new piece and try to fit it into a jigsaw puzzle that will give an accurate picture of the causes of heart disease.
